billEvents.eventText: referred to corporations, authorities and commissions

title: Relates to the age requirement for police candidates for the police department of the metropolitan transportation authority
summary: Relates to the age requirement for police candidates for the police department of the metropolitan transportation authority.
actClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 586 of the laws of 2002 amending the public authorities law relating to creating an age limitation for police candidates for the police department of the metropolitan transportation authority, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
